text:
:alert: Exciting news!

:tropical_drink::rainbow:  Introducing <https://freshjuice.dev/blog/our-first-release/|FreshJuice> HubSpot Theme: vibrant, customizable HubSpot theme for a unique online presence. :art:

• :100: Free and Open-source
• :books: Human friendly documentation
• :catcoder: Continuous updates
• :3574_poopparrot: <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme|Clean code>
If you like the project, please share with friends and teammates, :star2: Star on <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme|GitHub>, :branch: fork on Github, and make your own theme.
Thank everyone :heart:
